careers.name: Talent Management
careers.description: Oversees the development, branding, and long-term careers of artists and performers, helping them choose opportunities and manage their image.

careers.name: Production Management
careers.description: Plans and manages budgets, schedules, crew, and logistics to keep film, TV, or live productions running smoothly.

careers.name: Event Management
careers.description: Organizes and runs concerts, premieres, festivals, and other entertainment events from planning to showtime.

careers.name: Marketing & PR
careers.description: Promotes artists, shows, and brands through campaigns, social media, press outreach, and creative storytelling.

careers.name: Casting
careers.description: Helps choose the right actors, dancers, and performers for roles in film, TV, theater, and commercials.

careers.name: Entertainment Writer
careers.description: Writes about movies, music, shows, and celebrities through reviews, recaps, interviews, and opinion pieces.

careers.name: Content Creator
careers.description: Creates short-form videos, posts, and series for platforms like TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram around entertainment topics.

careers.name: Musician/Singer
careers.description: Performs vocals or instruments for recordings, live shows, and collaborative music projects.

careers.name: Music Producer
careers.description: Shapes the sound, arrangement, and creative direction of songs and projects in the studio.

careers.name: Songwriter
careers.description: Writes lyrics, melodies, and hooks for artists, soundtracks, and commercial music.

careers.name: Audio Engineer
careers.description: Records, mixes, and polishes audio for songs, podcasts, films, and live sessions using studio technology.

careers.name: Animator
careers.description: Creates animated characters, motion graphics, and visual effects for film, TV, games, and social content.

careers.name: Graphic Design Artist
careers.description: Designs posters, cover art, social graphics, and visual branding for entertainment projects.

careers.name: Actor / Actress
careers.description: Portrays characters in film, TV, web series, commercials, and theater using voice, expression, and movement.

careers.name: Directing
careers.description: Leads the creative vision of a project, guiding performers and crew to bring a script or concept to life.

careers.name: Cinematography
careers.description: Designs and captures the visual look of a project through camera angles, lenses, and lighting.

careers.name: Video Editor
careers.description: Cuts and assembles footage, adds sound and graphics, and controls pacing to tell a clear visual story.

careers.name: Sound Design
careers.description: Creates sound effects, ambience, and audio textures that make scenes feel real and immersive.

careers.name: Set Design/Engineer
careers.description: Designs and helps build physical sets and environments for movies, TV shows, and stage productions.

careers.name: Makeup Artist
careers.description: Applies makeup and special effects looks for actors, performers, and on-camera talent.

careers.name: Social Media Manager
careers.description: Plans content, posts, and campaigns for brands, shows, or talent while tracking engagement and trends.

careers.name: Talent Recruitment
careers.description: Finds and recruits performers, athletes, or creative talent for teams, productions, or agencies.

careers.name: Sports Broadcaster
careers.description: Covers games and sports stories on air through hosting, commentary, or sideline reporting.

careers.name: Game Day Operations
careers.description: Runs behind-the-scenes logistics for live games, from timing and cues to fan experience elements.

careers.name: Dance Videographer
careers.description: Films dancers and choreography in a way that highlights movement, rhythm, and emotion.

careers.name: Choreographer
careers.description: Creates and teaches dance routines for music videos, tours, stage shows, and performances.

careers.name: Backup Dancer
careers.description: Performs choreographed routines behind lead artists in performances, tours, and music videos.

careers.name: Theatre Performer
careers.description: Performs in live stage productions, combining acting, movement, and sometimes singing.
